Hialeah.Biscayne Gardens, Florida:
Biscayne Gardens is neighborhood of Golden Glades, a CDP and unincorporated community in Miami-Dade County, Florida, United States. Biscayne Gardens is located about 10 miles (16 km) north of Downtown Miami, just south of the Golden Glades interchange and east of Opa-locka.


== Geography ==
It is located at 25.913°N 80.21°W﻿ / 25.913; -80.21, with an elevation 20 feet (6.1 m).
